mapper.select: SELECT customer_pk, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_name, admin_yn FROM customers WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY customer_pk asc
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE customer_pk = #{customerPk}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_pk, notice_title, create_id, create_date, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_date FROM notice where deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY notice_pk asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (board_category_pk, notice_title, notice_contents, create_id, create_date) VALUES ('b1', #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContents}, #{createId}, NOW())

INSERT INTO board_file (board_category_pk, review_pk, notice_pk, qna_pk, original_file_name, stored_file_path, create_date) VALUES
( #{item.boardCategoryPk}, #{item.reviewPk}, #{item.noticePk}, #{item.qnaPk}, #{item.originalFileName}, #{item.storedFilePath}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.notice_pk, a.notice_title, a.notice_contents, a.create_id, b.stored_file_path FROM notice as a LEFT OUTER JOIN board_file as b ON a.notice_pk = b.notice_pk WHERE a.notice_pk = #{noticePk}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title= #{noticeTitle}, notice_contents= #{noticeContents}, update_date= NOW(), create_id= 'admin' WHERE notice_pk = #{noticePk}
UPDATE notice SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE notice_pk = #{noticePk}
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_pk, a.product_category_pk, a.product_name, a.product_stock_cnt, a.product_store, b.board_Idx FROM product as a JOIN product_stock as b ON a.product_pk = b.product_pk
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_category_pk, product_name, product_price, product_stock_cnt, product_store, product_detail) VALUES (#{productCategoryPk}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStockCnt}, #{productStore}, #{productDetail})

INSERT INTO product_file (product_pk, original_file_name, stored_file_path) VALUES
( #{item.productPk}, #{item.originalFileName}, #{item.storedFilePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_pk, a.product_name, b.qna_pk, b.board_category_pk, b.qna_title, b.qna_contents, b.create_id, b.product_pk, b.answer_contents, b.answer_yn, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS create_date FROM product as a JOIN qna as b ON a.product_pk = b.product_pk
